message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to me, but I understand its worth to you is $8000. Considering this, I would like to offer it to you for $9500. This price reflects a thoughtful compromise between its value to me and its perceived value to you. I believe this is a fair offer that allows us both to benefit. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further.
